directions: Blend orange, dates, almonds, and 3 Tbsp. water in a blender on low speed until almonds are finely ground. Increase speed to high and blend until mixture is no longer grainy, about 1 minute. Add banana, kale, almond milk, and 1/2 cup ice; blend until drink is smooth and thick.
ingredients: 1/4 cup unsweetened almond milk or coconut water
title: Almond, Kale, and Banana Smoothie
